title: Happy New Year 2007!
content:
My annual topic! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopekeen.gif[/img]

As said, Happy New Year everyone! 2007 will be a great year to me, there'll be a lot cool new music and good movies. And some other things worth waiting.

What are you people doing today? Likely not replying to this topic, at least.. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img] I don't have anything special in sight, I'll be home alone.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Happy New Year 2007!
content:

title: Re: Happy New Year 2007!
content:
Eleven hours left for me...

Happy new year everyone! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] ____________
Don't think of me as an ordinary man.

Even though I am an ordinary man.

Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site.[/url]

title: Re: Happy New Year 2007!
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]KR: I don't have anything special in sight, I'll be home alone.[hr][/quote]

I'll have a special dinner. Twelve and a half hours before New Year here, btw.

I'm sure that 2007 will be great year for me. I also think that the community will be more active than on 2006. (Don't ask me why or how, it's just a hunch.)

Happy New Year everyone![hr]SM: "I could go and write a page about the Theory of Relativity (or whatever it's called), but, what is the point if I don't know what the Theory of Relativity is?"

title: Re: Happy New Year 2007!
content:
Yep, I'm feeling the same! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] 2006 hasn't been my best year.. It'd suck entirely if not for a few excellent things happening in it. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] 2007 will be a lot better, I feel.

And yep, I believe there'll be more cool Keen stuff on 2007. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-yorp.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Happy New Year 2007!

I have to spend my time with my family their gang.

title: Re: Happy New Year 2007!
content:
I shall repeat here my latest journal entry at DA.

[hr]Welcome to the next year in this amazing saga we call Existence. (Or life, or being, or whatever synonym you may choose to substitute). I know it's gonna be the best one so far for me, and I wish the same for everyone who reads this.

Our calendar is rather arbitrary, and not as meaningful as the likes of the Mayan calendar, but it's something we agree on and thus has a significant impact on our lives. Let's hope it's a good one.[hr]
I also see this year marking a new high for the Keen community. Looking forward to it.

YAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHH!!!! *moshes*

content:
